keyword: calories in an in n out burger
title: Calories in an In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Discover calories in an In-N-Out burger, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out burger provides ~390 kcal with 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 390 kcal for a standard hamburger.

faqs.q: What are the macros for an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: 16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs (2 g fiber).

faqs.q: Is sodium high in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Yes, around 730 mg due to the spread and seasoning.
Adds ~50 kcal and more saturated fat from the cheese.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burgers customizable for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for protein style (lettuce wrap) to cut ~170 kcal by removing the bun.
